DataSource.query:
select
a.*
,'CF_DAT_GJ_'||substr( a.monat,2,4)


from
(
select
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'01.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
from
vr_parameter
where
1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'02.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'03.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'04.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,

UNION ALL

UNION ALL

FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT

'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'22.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'23.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'24.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'25.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'26.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'27.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
SELECT 
'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM') AS monat,
'28.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
select
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 28
  THEN 'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM')
END AS monat,
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 28
  THEN '29.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
END 
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
select
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 29
  THEN 'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM')
END AS monat,
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 29
  THEN '30.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
END 
FROM vr_parameter
UNION ALL
select
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 30
  THEN 'M'||to_char(LAST_DAY(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'YYYYMM')
END AS monat,
CASE
  WHEN to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')),'DD')) > 30
  THEN '31.'||to_char(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'),'MM')||'.20'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2)
END 
FROM vr_parameter
) a
where monat is not null
